participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and adventurous, loves to socialize but has a fear of heights.
participant_1.background: i am a party animal. i'm deathly afraid of heights. i help out at the food bank occasionally. i own a cat and a dog.

participant_2.personality: Laid-back and creative, enjoys quiet hobbies and is passionate about sports.
participant_2.background: i have a german shepherd dog. i live is a rural farming community. i enjoy coloring books. i like to watch nhl hockey.
